Summary: orange glowing object with erratic flight path. Hovered, then went out like a dying ember.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Details I was sitting by a fire out in my yard. I saw a glowing orange-red light. There were no flashing lights, like an airplane has, so I started watching it. It went fast, then slow, then fast again. Then it hovered over the treetops in the distance where the glow died like a dying ember. I wept.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Powder Springs
There were no other sightings in Powder Springs on or around November 20th 2012
